name: Martyr

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in all battles by 33%

skills.name: Rush
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 45% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%
Lvl. 7 Buff/Debuff Chance +159

skills.name: Bastion of Faith
skills.raw_description:
Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff and a [Counterattack] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Suppression
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Places a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns. Places a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +10%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

faction.name: Sacred Order
faction.default_description: Sacred Order is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 53 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Sacred Order is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 47 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: For centuries the Knights of the Sacred Order were charged with cleansing Teleria of evil in all its guises. But since the declaration of war, they have sworn allegiance to the Queen of Aravia. In league with the Queen's Necromancer, these once-holy knights now enforce her Majesty's will and guard her chattel.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Martyr is a legendary def champion from the faction Sacred Order doing spirit damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Sacred Order, Martyr is a champion of Legendary rarity and of Def type
